title: The Lazy Dragon Is Working Hard - Novel Updates
tags: Dragons   Gods   Lazy Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Multiple POV   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   Reincarnation
author: Unhealty Excellent Children   不健康優良児
description:
A high school student was run over by a truck and couldn't escape death. Ichiro thought that he was dead, in truth, he had been reincarnated into a different world called Gaia. He became one of seven divine guardians.

Tough body, strong abilites, makes him excited. 'I will spend my day lazily! Yeah!'. However as a guardian he has lots of things to do. Today, the lazy dragon will be trying to protect the peace of the world again. Protecting the world peace so he can take an afternoon nap and spend his days lazily.>
